_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: » SAMP
author: daniscript18@outlook.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

cd /tmp || exit

wget https://www.gta-multiplayer.cz/downloads/samp037svr_R2-2-1.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server
tar -xzvf samp037svr_R2-2-1.tar.gz --strip-components=1 -C /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server || exit

sed -i '3d' /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "rcon_password changeplease" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg

chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server
